subject: Can't afford drugs you need
body:
Dear valued member.
Save on your products purchasing extra quality drugs at lower prices with CanadianPharmacy. We understand your desire to access the highest quality products and we offer the best products at the very low prices.
You can buy Canadian products at prices which are really lower than American products prices without compromising quality. 
For more information click herehttp://sugardrop.hk
Easy and secure ordering process.All your personal information will remain private and confidential.The highest quality customer service. Fast and safe delivery. 
Yours faithfully,Lorene Bolton
